p: One kilogram of waste plastics replaces ≈0.75 kg of coke, 1.3 kg of coal or 1 kg of heavy oil [ 56] in EAF steelmaking. A partial replacement of conventional metallurgical coke with high density polythene (HDPE) waste produces significant levels of slag foaming and lowers the energy consumption by 8–15 kWhr/tonne [ 105].
